metadata.name: BLISS
metadata.description:
BLISS (2022)  
Mixed media on canvas. 2.50m x 1.20m (98 x 47 inches)

Bliss when I connect with my soul. Bliss when I know there's so much love in the world. Bliss when I listen to my inner guidance. Bliss when I become 1 with everything. Bliss when I share this love with the greater family. Thank you gaia. Thank you life. Thank you love.
